channel.title: WP7608/WP7608-1 usage in India
channel.description:
Hi,
Has this been tried by anyone in India? What are the 3G/LTE AP configuration details? Other question on the third party SIMs - who are the service providers in India suited for this? Can we use any data SIM from the providers like Airtel, Vodafone, Reliance JIO, etc.
Please share your experience if someone happened to go through this use-case.
I believe this works with mangOH on-board Wi-Fi module in STA+AP mode
Thanks Madan

item.title: WP7608/WP7608-1 usage in India
item.dc:creator: ameypandit
item.description:
Hi @Madan Did you tried MangoOh Red with JIO or any other 4G provider in India? How was your experience?

Thanks

Read full topic
